--------------------------------------------------
Hi All,

 

Thank you for your time today.

 

As discussed, please provide your input in columns “M till P” (with your comments, agreed action plan and timelines) in the issue summary ( Business Continuity and Resilience Audit - Draft Findings Summary.xlsx <https://mctfze.sharepoint.com/:x:/s/RiskandCrisisCommittee-IssueSummary/EVQ4Nfw0tclBkcR4lJ-BSqsBL9LpKhQS_XYwxNBKGUVeAw?e=3ZYM3y> ). Please look for your name in column “J” – Primary Owners for the findings where your input is required. 

 

We would appreciate if you can provide your input by end of next week (Friday, 21st Feb 2025).

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> As agreed, please share all the missing insurance policies today for us to validate.

 

Feel free to reach out if further clarification is required.

 

Regards,

 

 

 

NIRMA HINGORANI​​​​

SENIOR INTERNAL AUDITOR

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

KSA

Arabian Luxury Gifts Company Limited LLC

Covered as a separate policy

 

Validation:

 

- Duly included within the sum insured declarations for KSA. “KSA - Marine File.xls” from 3rd attachment

 



 

- Invoice copy for relevant policy validating the insured entity, type of cover, policy period and premium matching the above. (5th attachment – file is available in share folder as well)

 



 

KSA

Chalhoub Group Arabia Limited Co LLC

Covered as a separate policy

 

Validation:

 

- Duly included within the sum insured declarations for KSA. “KSA - Marine File.xls” from 3rd attachment

 



 

- Invoice copy for relevant policy validating the insured entity, type of cover, policy period and premium matching the above. (6th attachment – file is available in share folder as well)

 



 

UAE

3D Develop, Design, Deliver LLC

Insured together with Allied.

 

- 3D does not import or export products. As such, generally there is no need to insure 3D.

- For reference 2022-2023, there was no imports or exports for 3DW

- For 2023-2024, total imports/exports for 3D were USD 3,858 

 

Validation:

 

- Duly included within the sum insured declarations for UAE. (7th attachment)



 

- Invoice copy for relevant policy with premium matching the above. (8th attachment – file is available in share folder as well)

 



UAE

SAJ Emirates Trading L.L.C.

Insured together with Allied.

 

Validation:

 

- Duly included within the sum insured declarations for UAE. (7th attachment)
